cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 105 miles SSE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Drifting north-northwest, expected to bend northwest and then north, bringing the center toward the South-North Carolina coast and remaining well south of New Jersey while weakening
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the North Carolina/South Carolina border (close to Myrtle Beachâ€“Cape Fear area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to south of South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC to Cape Lookout NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primarily the coasts of South Carolina and North Carolina
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible; probability of sustained tropical-storm-force winds remains below 10%
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rain bands possible, generally under 2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk along nearby New Jersey beaches
